input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas - Owl Blue

Item features:
Full-bodied PJs with animal character embroidery
100% cotton
Elasticized trim for a comfy fit
Long sleeves for front and back legs to helps prevent shedding
Machine wash cold, lay flat to dry
input_text.Response A: Attention all dog lovers! Are you tired of constantly having to brush your dog's hair off of everything? Say goodbye to endless shedding with the Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas in Owl Blue! Our full-bodied PJs come with animal character embroidery and long sleeves for front and back legs to help prevent shedding. The elasticized trim provides a comfy fit, and the 100% cotton material is machine washable for easy care. Just be sure to wash it cold and lay it flat to dry. Give your furry friend the gift of comfort with our Animal Overalls Dog Pajamas. Order now and take the first step towards a happier, hair-free home.
input_text.Response B: These blue overall-style dog PJs are made of 100% cotton. They feature fun stripe designs and detailed patchwork embroidery of a popular animal character -- Perfect to prevent your dog from shedding all over your bed when you snuggle with them at night!
